author: Veera Kuisma
title: Our new album just arrived!
body: Today is a happy day because our new album is here! You can order the physical CD from here on our website for 19.99€ + shipping to your address! Digital albums also coming soon, stay tuned for more information, news and music!

author: Elias Frigård
title: Preorders shipping out now!
body: We have now started sending out pre-orders of our album. We are so grateful to everyone who supported us during this time and process! Creating albums on your own can be daunting and financially uncertain, but thanks to your help we made it through with an awesome result. Thank you! If you haven’t ordered our album yet, you can do so from the home page on this website.

author: Elias Frigård
title: Album available on iTunes and Amazon!
body: Our album is now available in digital format from iTunes and Amazon. You can find the links on the homepage of this website! If you would rather order a physical CD, we are of course still shipping our album to many different locations, and you can order it from our web shop. We hope that you are all enjoying the music!

author: Veera Kuisma
title: We are now on Bandcamp!
body: You can now find us from Bandcamp where you can buy our digital and physical CD. We are so damn proud of this album finally seeing the daylight, so please go check it out, we want you to hear it!

author: Elias Frigård
title: Nine Worlds reviewed in Finnish Folk Music Magazine!
body: We are honored that Nine Worlds received this nice review in the third edition of this years "Kansanmusiikki" -newspaper by Finnish journalist and musician Tove Djupsjöbacka. It warms our hearts to hear these nice words about music that we have worked a long time to create!
